org.efaps.update.schema.program.staticsource

Class AbstractStaticSourceCompiler<T extends AbstractStaticSourceCompiler.AbstractSource>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.efaps.update.schema.program.staticsource.AbstractStaticSourceCompiler<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - sourcetype
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSSCompiler, JasperReportCompiler, JavaScriptCompiler, WikiCompiler

    public abstract class AbstractStaticSourceCompiler<T extends AbstractStaticSourceCompiler.AbstractSource>
extends Object
    Class used to compile JavaScript and style sheets.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    The eFaps Team

      • compileAll

        public static void compileAll(List<String> _classPathElements)
                       throws EFapsException
        Static Method that executes the method compile for the SubClasses CSSCompiler and JavaScriptCompiler.
        Parameters:
        _classPathElements - elements on the classpath
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • compile

        public void compile()
             throws EFapsException
        This method is doing the actual compiling in the following steps.
      • read all existing compiled source from the eFaps-DataBase
      • read all sources from the eFaps-DataBase
      • compile all sources (including the extending of any super type) and insert it into the eFaps-DataBase
Throws:
EFapsException - on error

  • readCompiledSources

    protected Map<String,String> readCompiledSources()
                                          throws EFapsException
    This method reads all compiled Sources from the eFaps-DataBase and returns a map with name to oid relation.
    Returns:
    Map with name to oid of the compiled source
    Throws:
    EFapsException - on error

  • readSources

    protected List<T> readSources()
                                                                           throws EFapsException
    This method reads all Sources from the eFapsDataBase and returns for each Source a Instance of AbstractSource in a List.
    Returns:
    List with AbstractSources
    Throws:
    EFapsException - on error

  • getSuper

    protected List<Instance> getSuper(Instance _instance)
                           throws EFapsException
    Recursive method that searches the SuperSource for the current Instance identified by the oid.
    Parameters:
    _instance - Instance the Super Instance will be searched
    Returns:
    List of SuperSources in reverse order
    Throws:
    EFapsException - error
